navigators.smart.statemanagment

Class SMMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • navigators.smart.communication.SystemMessage
      • navigators.smart.statemanagment.SMMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable

    public class SMMessage
extends SystemMessage
implements java.io.Externalizable
    This classe represents a message used in the state transfer protocol
    See Also:

        Constructs a SMMessage
        Parameters:
        sender - Process Id of the sender
        eid - Execution ID up to which the sender needs to be updated
        type - Message type
        replica - Replica that should send the state
        state - State log
